bilingual.target: 这个问题深刻地影响了他的生活。
她的演讲深刻地打动了观众。

bilingual.source: She deeply felt the care of her friends.
bilingual.target: 她深刻地感受到了朋友的关怀。

bilingual.source: He deeply understood the meaning of the book.
bilingual.target: 他深刻地理解了这本书的意义。

bilingual.source: His love for her is deeply rooted in his heart.
bilingual.target: 他对她的爱深刻地根植于心。

bilingual.source: It deeply mirrored the social reality at that time.
bilingual.target: 它深刻地反映了当时的社会现实。

bilingual.source: HSPs wield the power to feel things more deeply than others.
bilingual.target: 高度敏感者比其他人更能深刻地感受事物。

bilingual.source: This archaism announced deeply to learn is a process that accompanies life.
bilingual.target: 这句古语深刻地揭示了学习是一个伴随生命的过程.

bilingual.source: Mobile phone condole acts the role of an electron to intervening deeply our daily life.
bilingual.target: 手机吊饰电子正在深刻地介入我们的日常生活.

bilingual.source: I think being married enables me to think more deeply about playing melodramatic parts.
bilingual.target: 我想，因为结婚让我更深刻地理解感情戏的表演。

yingyinNormal.en: You will accompany us. I am deeply honored.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以加入我们。我深感荣幸。

yingyinNormal.en: That's Anger. He cares very deeply about things being fair.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是"怒怒"，他特别讨厌不公平的事。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I'm deeply respectful of these Laws that keep us safe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我非常尊重这些确保我们安全的法则。

yingyinNormal.en: Why can't she do it? Cause we've got a deeply unhealthy relationship.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她干嘛不自己来? 因为我们母子关系亲密得不正常。

yingyinNormal.en: Emotions run deep within our race, in many ways more deeply than in humans.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的种族把情感隐藏的很深，在很多情况下，要比人类深得多。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, look at all of you. You're all very deeply beautiful. Especially you, Farkle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看，你们所有人，你们内心深处全都那么美，尤其是你，法尔科。

yingyinNormal.en: At times, there were long periods of estrangement. We hurt each other often and deeply.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们曾有过很长时间的疏离，我们经常深深地伤害对方。

yingyinNormal.en: We're deeply honored, my child. I invite you to rest then join me and the ladies of the court.
yingyinNormal.zh: 孩子，我们深感荣幸，我请你先去休整完毕，然后与我以及宫里的姐妹为伴。

yingyinNormal.en: I know you care about her deeply. I know you invited her to one of your special board meetings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你很在乎她，我知道你邀请她参加了一次你的特别董事会。

yingyinNormal.en: Morning. Morning. I have to say I slept splendidly. Granted, not long, but just deeply and well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 早上好。我必须要说我睡的非常香甜，虽然时间不长，但是睡眠质量很好。

yingyinNormal.en: I opened up and shared something deeply upsetting to me, and you treated it as if it were nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我打开心灵跟你分享让我心烦意乱的事，可你却毫不在意。

yingyinNormal.en: I was so deeply troubled to hear of Kublai's own tragedy. Wives should not be taken in such a fashion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过听闻忽必烈大汗所遭之罪我深感不安，夫人们不应遭受如此对待。

yingyinNormal.en: We can care deeply, selflessly about those we know, but that empathy rarely extends beyond our line of sight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以深沉而无私地关心自己的亲人，但是对于那些不认识的人，我们少有付出。

yingyinNormal.en: Through actually studying economic psychology, I was trying to figure out what are these deeply held beliefs people have are actually wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过学习经济心理学，我试着弄清人们根深蒂固实际上错的信念是什么。

yingyinNormal.en: A firm whose roots are so deeply embedded into Wall Street that our very founders sailed over on the Mayflower and chiseled the name Stratton Oakmont right into Plymouth Rock!
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个深耕于华尔街的公司，我们的创始人可是乘着五月花号将斯奥这个名字凿刻在移民石上一个深耕于华尔街的公司，我们的创始人可是乘着五月花号将斯奥这个名字凿刻在普利茅斯的石头上。

yingyinNormal.en: And I have been deeply touched this year by the selflessness of aid workers and medical volunteers who have gone abroad to help victims of conflict or of diseases like Ebola, often at great personal risk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今年我深深感动于救助人员和医疗志愿者的无私，他们远赴他乡，不顾个人安危，来到战地救助难民，去往疫区对抗埃博拉。

yingyinNormal.en: Realizing that made me a hyper-realist, by which I mean I became someone who has discovered the great rewards of deeply understanding, accepting, and working with reality as it is, and not as I wish it would be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 意识到这一点我变得非常现实，我的意思是说通过深度理解接受并真正处理现实，而不是想当然地处理现实，我从中获益匪浅。

yingyinNormal.en: My deep pain led me to reflect deeply on my circumstances. It also led me to reflect on nature, because it provides a guide for what's true. So I thought a lot about how things work, which helped to put me, and my own circumstances, in perspective.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的痛苦让我深深地反思了自己的境遇，也让我反思了自然，指引我辨别是非。我想了很多到底是怎么回事，帮助我更好地看清自己，和自己的境遇。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (与某些动词连用)强烈地; 深刻地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: (与某些动词连用)强烈地; 深刻地

examination_example.sentence: And guilt, by prompting us to think more <highlight>deeply</highlight> about our goodness, can encourage humans to make up for errors and fix relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而内疚，通过促使我们更深入地思考自己的善良，可以鼓励人类弥补错误，修复关系。

examination_example.sentence: The drive to discover is <highlight>deeply</highlight> rooted in humans, much the same as the basic drives for food or shelter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 探索的欲望深深根植于人类，这与他们寻求食物或住所的基本欲望非常相似。

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>deeply</highlight> uncomfortable – it's the emotional equivalent of wearing a jacket weighted with stones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这让人非常不舒服，这感觉就像穿着一件装了石头的夹克。

examination_example.sentence: Beethoven was a <highlight>deeply</highlight> political man in the broadest sense of the word.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从最广泛的意义上说，贝多芬是一个深具政治色彩的人。

sense_info_list.en: to a depth that is quite a long way from the surface of something

exam_freq_info.chinese: (与某些动词连用)强烈地; 深刻地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (与某些动词连用)强烈地; 深刻地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 深度；深奥；深刻；深处；纵深；纵深感；渗透（或渗漏）深度；下降深度；下达深度；立体感

word_family.mean: adj. 深的；剧烈的；极度的；深沉的；深色的；深刻的；幽深的；深奥的；深陷的；纵深的

sense_info_list.zh: (与某些动词连用)强烈地; 深刻地

examination_example.sentence: Many employees are <highlight>deeply</highlight> frustrated by IT.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多员工对信息技术感到强烈的沮丧。

examination_example.sentence: The focus on academic "skills and drills" has cut <highlight>deeply</highlight> into recess (课间休息) and other time for free play.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 聚焦于学业的“技巧和练习”已经大量占用了学生的课间休息和其他可以自由玩耍的时间。

examination_example.sentence: It provides a chance for people to think <highlight>deeply</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它为人们提供了一个深刻思考的机会。

sense_info_list.en: to a depth that is quite a long way from the surface of something

examination_example.sentence: But researchers have come to realize that being humble generally indicates the presence of <highlight>deeply</highlight> admirable personal qualities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但研究人员已经意识到，谦虚通常意味着拥有极其令人钦佩的个人品质。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 深度；深奥；深刻；深处；纵深；纵深感；渗透（或渗漏）深度；下降深度；下达深度；立体感

word_family.mean: adj. 深的；剧烈的；极度的；深沉的；深色的；深刻的；幽深的；深奥的；深陷的；纵深的

sense_info_list.en: to a depth that is quite a long way from the surface of something

examination_example.sentence: What's more, her filial piety has <highlight>deeply</highlight> touched me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更重要的是，她的孝心让我深深感动。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, the man thanked the old man <highlight>deeply</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，男人深深地感谢了老人。

examination_example.sentence: After hearing what had happened, he was also <highlight>deeply</highlight> moved.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听完这件事后，他也深受感动。
